title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/padarewski-robert.html
notes:
TO GLOBAL TRUST SECURITY COMPANY. 
 
Dear Mr Jeff Mongo.(Director)

My name is ----------- and I am a resident of ---------. 
I am writing to request for the transfer of my friend's consignment to me as she will be joining me here in my country very soon. I believe you have spoken to her in the past, her name is: MISS LENNY JISON. 
She has mailed me a copy of the deposit certificate and these are the details of the consignment ref:
CONSIGNMENT REFERENCE NUMBER:  TAS/RHB-LM208695000 COB
SECURITY CODE:  M6JACE-1-TRA5MU
If for any reason you need to contact me I can be reached at:
My Contact Information :
MY PHONE NUMBER IS :   
MY POSTAL ADDRESS : 
 
Please advise me how the consignment will be transferred safely to me and what your company will require as to transfer the consignment to me without any customs or police interference to my address above.
I look forward to hear from you at your earliest convenience. 
 
Regards,

So my dear, the above mail is the mail which I will like you to send to the security company today, so that they will get back to you so urgently, also do not disclosed to the security company the real contents of the boxe, because my late mother did registered it as a FAMILY VALUABLE/TRESURE EFFECT not as money so do not let them to know that is money. also when sending this mail to the security company please try to include your name and all your contact information's and call them on phone after sending the mail to notify them of your message, here is there contacts:
E-mail: info_globalvision@yahoo.com
Tel. 0022508794641 .
I will be stopping here until I hear from you, attachment is the affidavit of oath which proves you the new beneficiary of the the consignment box.
 
Thanks.
With love.
MISS FAITH.

messages.subject: From: Ms. Faith Robert.
messages.body:
faith_roa2@msn.com


	
	From: Ms. Faith Robert.
Lot 32 Iit 32 Rue De La Paix Marcory,
Abidjan Cote d'ivore
Email: faithingod1@sify.com
 
Dearest,
 
It is my pleasure to contact you for a business venture which I intend to establish in your country.Though I have not met with you before but I believe one has to risk confiding in succeed sometimes in life. I am Mis Faith Robert, 20 years old from ivory coast. daughter of Mrs Monica Robert the Secretary Wife and Personal Assistant to former ivory coast president. I have 8.5 million USD which was made by my mother before she was assasinated by unknown persons in oct 2006. My mother left this money in a security company here in my country. I seek your permision to transfer this fund into your country so that i could come to your country for investment and to further my studies. I want you to help me retrieve these fund from the security company and transfer it into your personal account in your country for investment purposes on these areas:
 
  1). Telecommunication
  2). the transport industry
  3). Five star hotel
  4). Real Estate
 
If you can be of an assistance to me i will be pleased to offer to you 10% Of the total fund.
 
I await your soonest response
Respectfully yours,
Ms. Faith Robert.
messages.raw:
Mrs. Faith Robert

faith_roa2@msn.com

Dearest,

It is my pleasure to contact you for a business venture which I intend to establish in your country.Though I have not met with you before but I believe one has to risk confiding in succeed sometimes in life. I am Mis Faith Robert, 20 years old from ivory coast. daughter of Mrs Monica Robert the Secretary Wife and Personal Assistant to former ivory coast president. I have 8.5 million USD which was made by my mother before she was assasinated by unknown persons in oct 2006. My mother left this money in a security company here in my country. I seek your permision to transfer this fund into your country so that i could come to your country for investment and to further my studies. I want you to help me retrieve these fund from the security company and transfer it into your personal account in your country for investment purposes on these areas:

1). Telecommunication
2). the transport industry

If you can be of an assistance to me i will be pleased to offer to you 10% Of the total fund.

I await your soonest response
Respectfully yours,
Ms. Faith Robert.

[A variant of the cocoa orphan letter. Or, if you like, of the widow-of-conveniently-dead-dictator letter.]

messages.body:
Hello! I am pleased that You contacted me, because my uncle works in local government agency, so he can help You with Your bussiness.
I will talk to him and send You details soon.
P.S. Please write to xxxxxxxx@xxxxxxxxxxxxx.pl - that's my secure address for business contacts.

W.Padarewski
messages.raw:
Witold Padarewski
Hello! I am pleased that You contacted me, because my uncle works in local government agency, so he can help You with Your bussiness.
I will talk to him and send You details soon.
P.S. Please write to xxxxxxxx@xxxxxxxxxxxxx.pl - that's my secure address for business contacts.

W.Padarewski

messages.body: OK. I made some arrangement here in Cardiff. It will be very easy to You to invest the money here. Just send me some ID to present to my uncle.
messages.raw:
Witold Padarewski

[Witold jogs the scammer]

OK. I made some arrangement here in Cardiff. It will be very easy to You to invest the money here. Just send me some ID to present to my uncle.

messages.subject: Response From Miss Faith Robert!
messages.body:
faith_roa2@msn.com


Dearest ,
 
Iam glad to hear from you and will use this opportunity to thank you once more and I for your consideration to attend to my proposal and Iam ready in all manner to seal the transaction with you, hoping this will mark the beginning of a long lasting business and family relationship between us.
I will like to explain to you how this investment project will be carried out and how you can help me so that the money will be transferred to your country from the Security company here. First of all, I want you to know that this money is safely deposited in a Vault of security company here by my mother before she died, during the deposit, she told the security company that this fund will transferred to her foreign business partners country whom she will submit the details for the transfer, unfortunately, she did not submit the data to the security company before she was assasinated.
I need to submit to the security company here, the data of our foreign partner for the transfer of the fund.  Since my late mother did not submit any information to the concerning her partner to the security company here, I decided to contact you so that you can assist me by giving me your personal data to submit to the security company as the business associate of my mother, this will enable the security company transfer the fund to your country. Do not fear because all process will be legal and transparent. I have also visited the security company and every arrangement for the transfer of the fund has been concluded with the assistance and co-operation of the security company Manager, all i need now is your corporation.
I wish to use this opportunity to reassure you that this transaction is 100% risk free and genuine and will be executed in a transparent way. Considering the fact that we have not met and this fund are in cash, safely deposited in the vault of a private Security Company by my late mother. She did not let the Security Company know that it is money inside the box but she told the Company officials that it is our family treasures that are inside the box. I want to know if you can be able to come here because of this transaction so that you will help me in the retrieval of the box containing the fund from the Security Company and then proceed to the transfer to your account for us to invest together.
 
But if you can not be able to come here, you can indicate in your next reply because I have to get all the legal documents to justify that you are my late mother business partner and the beneficiary of the Fund legally. Once these documents are established on your name, you will have the power to contact the company as my late mother partner and the beneficiary of the box containing the Fund requesting for the release of the box in their custody.
Because of this reason, I need you to send me the follow informations concerning your person which will help me here to establish legal documents that proves the existence of our partnership:
 
1. YOUR FULL NAME, 
2) YOUR ADDRESS, 
3) PRIVATE TELEPHONE/MOBILE AND FAX NUMBERS
4) DATE OF BIRTH.
 
Once I receive the above mentioned inform, I will be going to the company to inform them that you as my late mother business partner will be coming or contact them on my behalf for the release of the box in their custody. It is my pleasure to inform you that I will give you 10% of the total sum for your kind assistance, 5% has been mapped out to cover local and international expenses that may be incurred by both parties either as a result of telephone bill, flight ticket e.t.c, while the remaining 85% shall be for me which shall be used for investment according to your advice.
Finally, please try and keep everything about this transaction very confidential and secret for security reasons and safety of my life because the transaction involves a huge amount of money.  I am only waiting here for the conclusion of this transaction, and then I will arrange and come to your country where I wish to stay for the rest of my life while you invest the money for me in any lucrative business after deducting your commission. 
Please, I am putting all my hope and trust in you, do not disappoint me or let me down.
 
Best regards, 
Miss Faith Robert .
messages.raw:
Mrs. Faith Robert

faith_roa2@msn.com

messages.subject: Please Contact the Security Company From Faith!
messages.body:
faith_private@yahoo.com



	
	 
Hi my lovely One, 
 
I am happy to inform you that I have successfully registered your name and data with the security company this afternoon as my late mother's foreign business Partner. Everything went successfully.
Having achieved this, it means that you have been recognised at the security company as the beneficiary of this fund and now have every legal right to contact them and request them to transfer the consignment box into your country.

Please contact the security company immediately through the contact below reconfirming to them that you are the Foreign Partner of Mrs. Alice Jison my late mother requesting them as well to transfer the consignment box into your country.
 
My dear, I got more hope and encouragement that my time of moving out from this my difficult situation which I have been through for all this years has arrived. I want you to know that I have placed all my hope and trust on you and would like you to please try everything in your power to make sure that you take me and my only inheritant along with you for me to start up a new life together with you over there in your country.
 
My lovely one, my life is in terrible danger here since the death of my late parents which I was left alone in this whole world and living my life since the event with pains and frightened and would like you to please for the sake of our God almighty and my life to try as much possible as you could to make sure that you rescue me from this danger for the GOD will reward you for your kindness. I also would like you to please try to keep this matter secret as I would like everything to remain a top secret between both of us only till we are through with this transaction and meet together in your country which I believe that God will help us to achieve.
 
Meanwhile,I would like you to contact the security company so as to discuss with them how the boxe could be transferred to you in your country without any problem or delay to enables me start coming to meet with you for the rest of my life as soon as you receive the boxe as I am drafting you a mail for you to fill your information's copy and send it to them today so that they will clarify you on how the shipment of the boxe could be done immediately without any delay or problems, below here is the draft ...

messages.subject: GLOBAL TRUST SECURITY COMPANY.
messages.body:
info_globalvisiona@yahoo.com


                      GLOBAL TRUST SECURITY COMPANY.       
                           01 Bp 7456 Abidjan 01 
                   Zone 3, Lot 230 Abidjan, Cote d Ivoire. 
                           Tele/Fax:0022-508-794-641.
 
                              
                               RETRANSFER
 
              NOTIFICATION OF CONSIGNMENT RELEASE AND DELIVERY.
 
Att:Mr.W.Padarewski. 
Sir,
 
Global Security Company are in receipt of your mail and the content is well noted. Your request to claim the consignment deposited under our custody on behalf of Miss Lenny Jison is acceptable.whereby Miss Lenny Jison. Has discussed with us and she told us that she want the consignment to be deliver to your country through our special diplomatic immunity. We have about three different way of delivery consignment to overseas be rest assured that we are going to give you the best of our service.
 
Before the consignment can be release to you there are some legal documents you will be required to secure from the Ministry of justice here in Cote d'Ivoire for a legal claiming of the consignment out of our custody.
 
The mentioned documents are bellow.
 
1).Affidavit of claim:(1600€).
2).Change of ownership:(980€).
 
The two mentioned above documents will be secure from the ministry of justice here in Cote d'Ivoire for a declaration of you as the rightful ownership of the consignment hence the original depositor is dead and her daughter been the rightful next of kin has appointed you to claim and receive the consignment on her behalf. To become the new next of kin accordingly we have to secure these documents to enable us process the release of the consignment to you UK.
 
The two documents is going to be secure with the help of our legal department who will go to the ministry of justice to apply for these documents on your behalf. Here is the cost to secure the required documents from the Ministry of Justice. After our confirmation this morning by the Ministry registrar that the official cost of the two documents is 2580€ only.
 
Immediately we received the  information required and the payment for the commencement of the Affidavit of claim and Change of Ownership we shall immediately move ahead to secure the documents as required and the copies will be send to you for a confirmation of the development after that our diplomatic department will proceed on their arrangement to deliver the consignment to your home through our special diplomatic means.
 
Without wasting time we are forwarding to you the name and information where you will be required to send the money via Western Union Money transfer or Money Gram on our secretary's name.
 
Name of receiver: Mrs. Emeka Ofoaro.
Address: Abidjan Cote d'Ivoire.
Test question: Who send the money?
Answer: Mr.W.Padarewski.
 
After sending the money send the payment information's for the retrieving of the money.
 
Thanks for your understanding. 
Mr.Jeff Mongo. Director,G.T.S.C.
Be rest assured that we are going to give you the best of our service.

messages.body:
I have checked the data in Wester Union...
Sender's first name: Witold
Sender's last name: Padarewski
Receiver's name : Mrs. Emeka Ofoaro, Abidjan Cote d'Ivoire.
Test question: Who sends the money?
Answer: Witold Padarewski
Amount: 2580€
When I will be able to make a scanned copy of the slip, I will send it to You (it could be probably on monday).

If the money was not delivered, an error must have occured in Your office.

messages.body:
Hello again, sir!

I have scanned the payment slip from Western Union...

I have also started the complaint procedure in Western Union.
They will try to check the transaction route and answer as soon as they can.
If they will find some errors that may have ocuured during the wire transfer, they will get my money back, so that I can replay the procedure.
